name: The House Always Wins
description: If you do not lose the match in the next 6 rounds, you win the match. Receive $1,000 per round while this buff is active.

immediateEffect.script: Log(PlayerDisplayName + " bets it all! The House Always Wins!");

hooks.OnBuffExpire: Battle.Winner = Player; Log("THE HOUSE ALWAYS WINS! " + PlayerDisplayName + " wins the match!");
